title: AWSBaseConfig
description: Base AWS configuration for authentication. Supports static credentials, IAM roles, and default credential provider chain.

region.description: AWS Region (e.g., us-east-1). When set, enables AWS authentication.

accessKeyId.description: AWS Access Key ID. Falls back to default credential provider chain if not set.

secretAccessKey.description: AWS Secret Access Key. Falls back to default credential provider chain if not set.

sessionToken.description: AWS Session Token for temporary credentials.

assumeRoleArn.description: ARN of IAM role to assume for cross-account access.

endpointUrl.description: Custom endpoint URL for AWS-compatible services (MinIO, LocalStack).
